name: stream-source
description: Read binary streams in chunks, on demand, with promises.

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n sources.stream -o dist/stream-source.js -- index.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" -o dist/stream-source.min.js -cm -- dist/stream-source.js
